name: Blacksmith: Dark Times
description: Take on the role of blacksmith in the castle, create weapons and sell it to soldiers, or the army of darkness will capture the last castle, which the darkness has not yet found.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit or later Processor: Intel Core i5 , AMD equivalent or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectXÂ®-compatible Additional Notes: 32 bit version of the game works fine on 64 bit systems, tested.
